description: It is generated when a client succeeded to logon.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::hh3cWaClientLogon HH3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::hh3cWaClientMacAddr s EXAMPL RFC1213-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HH3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::hh3cWaVlanID i 9999

description: The MAC address of the client.
variables.name: HH3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::hh3cWaClientMacAddr

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifDescr

description: The Vlan ID associate with the port and the MAC address.
variables.name: HH3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::hh3cWaVlanID

description: It is generated when a client failed to logon, the hh3cWaReasonCode
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::hh3cWaClientLogonFail HH3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::hh3cWaClientMacAddr s EXAMPL RFC1213-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HH3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::hh3cWaVlanID i 9999 HH3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::hh3cWaReasonCode i 1

description: The MAC address of the client.
variables.name: HH3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::hh3cWaClientMacAddr

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifDescr

description: The Vlan ID associate with the port and the MAC address.
variables.name: HH3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::hh3cWaVlanID

description: The code indicates the reason for the action of this trap.
The global number of connections is up to max.
The global number of connections is up to configured max value.
The interface number of connections is up to max.
The username or password is too long or username is empty.
The online time is over the max value.
There was no data flow for the connection.
Web authentication was disabled on interface.
The interface VLAN value was changed.
variables.name: HH3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::hh3cWaReasonCode

description: It is generated when a client logout, the hh3cWaReasonCode
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::hh3cWaClientLogout HH3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::hh3cWaClientMacAddr s EXAMPL RFC1213-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HH3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::hh3cWaVlanID i 9999 HH3C-WEB-AUTHENTICATION-MIB::hh3cWaReasonCode i 1

interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifDescr

description: The Vlan ID associate with the port and the MAC address.

description: The code indicates the reason for the action of this trap.
The global number of connections is up to max.
The global number of connections is up to configured max value.
The interface number of connections is up to max.

Web authentication was disabled on interface.

description: It is generated when a system action was occurred, the hh3cWaActionCode
The code indicates the system action.
